page.title: 07The School.
page.content:
To find out how old the school is we looked in the School Log Book. The little class was built before 1876 because in the old log book it said the school was opened in 1876.
In 1956 the school was very noisy as the workmen were removing the door and they were taking up the floor. The large classroom was very cold without a door only a tarpaulin stopped the cold weather coming in. All the new buildings took a whole year to make.
In 1961 during the Easter holidays suspended ceilings were put up.
